currentMe.altText: Me at a Super Smash Bros. Melee tournament

youngMe.altText: A picture of me as a 6 year old who's mildly amused, with frayed hair that goes halfway down my forhead, sporting a plaid shirt and glasses with circular lenses. Holding up an item in a plastic package with text that indicates that the item is a GameCube with a Game Boy catridge slot.
